attributes.action: Stop behaving like a spoilt child
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Can we please get some decency into politics. The PM has avoided the expenses row for years, and when he enters it he makes a mess of it. Then tries to pretend he doesn't regret anything. 

Does he think we are stupid? Just who is he trying to kid?

Can we not have some honesty and admit when you are wrong, seek praise when you are right. No wonder politics has a lousy reputation

rejection.details: Your petition must make a point about government policy. Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
